name: Zyga Hunter
description:
Zyga Hunter is a game in which the player takes the role of the robot ZE-2001, a small repair robot that has been modified to capture aliens called Zyga. ZE will have to use strategy and problem solving to find repair parts for the damaged power grid, place traps and use tools to capture Zyga. 

Zyga have infested several areas of the city and must be removed with traps and the areas repaired with parts found in the area. Once all the Zyga have been dealt with ZE will venture on to end the invasion. Can you contain the Zyga threat and save Hi-Cordia? 

Number of players: 1

System requirements: 

Windows 10

Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster

Nvidia Geforce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280x series card or higher 

4GB of ram

200 MB available space

 Limited controller support

This game is designed for mouse and keyboard but a controller does have limited functionality

Gamepad Controls:

X/Square: Pick up trap

A/X: Drop trap

Y/ Triangle: Flashbomb

B/Circle: Pause

Left Bumper/L1: Zoom out

Right Bumper/R1: Zoom in

Right joystick/R3 (while zoomed): Tilt camera

Left joystick/L3: Move
